com.vmware.appliance

Interface LocalAccounts

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.vmware.vapi.internal.bindings.CompletionStageService, LocalAccountsTypes, Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocalAccountsStub

    public interface LocalAccounts
extends Service, LocalAccountsTypes, com.vmware.vapi.internal.bindings.CompletionStageService
    The LocalAccounts interface provides methods to manage local user account. This interface was added in vSphere API 6.7.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      Invocable that represents the LocalAccounts#list vAPI operation.

      Invocable that represents the LocalAccounts#set vAPI operation.

      Invocable that represents the LocalAccounts#update vAPI operation.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        LocalAccounts.GetInvocation get(java.lang.String username)
        Get the local user account information. This method was added in vSphere API 6.7.

        Invocation Result:
        Local user account information

        Operation Errors:
        NotFound - If the account is not found
        Error - Generic error

        Parameters:
        username - User login name
        Returns:
        instance of LocalAccounts.GetInvocation which upon invoke executes the above described get operation. The operation result or the operation error will be stored in the CompletionStageFuture that invoke returns.

      • list

        LocalAccounts.ListInvocation list()
        Get a list of the local user accounts. This method was added in vSphere API 6.7.

        Invocation Result:
        List of identifiers The return value will contain identifiers for the resource type: com.vmware.appliance.local_accounts.

        Operation Errors:
        Error - Generic error

        Returns:
        instance of LocalAccounts.ListInvocation which upon invoke executes the above described list operation. The operation result or the operation error will be stored in the CompletionStageFuture that invoke returns.

      • create

        LocalAccounts.CreateInvocation create(java.lang.String username,
                                      LocalAccountsTypes.Config config)
        Create a new local user account. This method was added in vSphere API 6.7.

        Operation Errors:
        AlreadyExists - If an account already exists
        InvalidArgument - If a username is invalid (username is validated against [a-zA-Z0-9][a-zA-Z0-9\-\.@]*[a-zA-Z0-9] pattern)
        Error - Generic error

        Parameters:
        username - User login name The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: com.vmware.appliance.local_accounts.
        config - User configuration
        Returns:
        instance of LocalAccounts.CreateInvocation which upon invoke executes the above described create operation. The operation result or the operation error will be stored in the CompletionStageFuture that invoke returns.

        Operation Errors:

        Error - Generic error
